summary: Set in the wake of the 1916 Easter Rising, a married woman in a small Irish village has an affair with a troubled British officer.
cast: Robert Mitchum|Trevor Howard|Christopher Jones|John Mills|Leo McKern|Sarah Miles|Barry Foster|Marie Kean|Arthur O'Sullivan|Evin Crowley|Douglas Sheldon|Gerald Sim|Barry Jackson|Des Keogh|Niall Toibin|Philip O'Flynn|Donal Neligan|Brian O'Higgins|Niall O'Brien|Owen Sullivan|Emmet Bergin|May Cluskey|Annie D'Alton|Julian Holloway|Pat Layde|Ed O'Callaghan
title: La hija de Ryan
